ModMetaData.name: Kobolds of the Rim [Revived for 1.4]
ModMetaData.author: Goob and LimeTreeSnake... and Aedhix too!
ModMetaData.description:
Kobolds of the Rim has been updated to RimWorld 1.4. This version doesn't have Biotech genes and things like that (as far as I'm aware), but you should be able to use KotR and Biotech together. Let me know if you have any problems with the mod.
I tried to get into contact with goobi or LimeTreeSnake for a week before publishing this myself. Hope you enjoy the long-awaited 1.4 update. -- Aedhix
Originally made by goobi and LimeTreeSnake. Link: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2569480318&searchtext=kobolds+of+the+rim
Original description:
-------------------------------------
The mod nobody asked for has finally arrived, Kobolds have managed to land in the harsh world of RimWorld and they're ready to steal and loot to their heart's content. These feisty little lizards come in many different colors and are (probably) a worthy addition to any colony good or bad.
